text: Gundam is the collective name for all the different Japanese anime series about giant fighting robots called Mobile Suits. There are many series, movies, comic books and video games based on the Gundam franchise. Gundam started what is called the Real Robot genre of anime, where the robots are more like machines than in Super Robot anime they are usually massive and the Gundam pilots do destroy multiple buildings but the government pays for the damages and the gundam are very high tech compared to different robot anime. Category:Anime Category:Sunrise (company)
title: Gundam
